name: HahnSeries.addVal_apply
initialProofState:
Γ : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : LinearOrderedCancelAddCommMonoid Γ
inst✝¹ : Ring R
inst✝ : IsDomain R
x : HahnSeries Γ R
⊢ Eq ((HahnSeries.addVal Γ R) x) x.orderTop
decl:
theorem addVal_apply {x : HahnSeries Γ R} :
    addVal Γ R x = x.orderTop :=
  AddValuation.of_apply _

name: HahnSeries.addVal_apply_of_ne
initialProofState:
Γ : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : LinearOrderedCancelAddCommMonoid Γ
inst✝¹ : Ring R
inst✝ : IsDomain R
x : HahnSeries Γ R
hx : Ne x 0
⊢ Eq ((HahnSeries.addVal Γ R) x) ↑x.order
decl:
@[simp]
theorem addVal_apply_of_ne {x : HahnSeries Γ R} (hx : x ≠ 0) : addVal Γ R x = x.order :=
  addVal_apply.trans (order_eq_orderTop_of_ne hx).symm

name: HahnSeries.addVal_le_of_coeff_ne_zero
initialProofState:
Γ : Type u_1
R : Type u_2
inst✝² : LinearOrderedCancelAddCommMonoid Γ
inst✝¹ : Ring R
inst✝ : IsDomain R
x : HahnSeries Γ R
g : Γ
h : Ne (x.coeff g) 0
⊢ LE.le ((HahnSeries.addVal Γ R) x) ↑g
decl:
theorem addVal_le_of_coeff_ne_zero {x : HahnSeries Γ R} {g : Γ} (h : x.coeff g ≠ 0) :
    addVal Γ R x ≤ g :=
  orderTop_le_of_coeff_ne_zero h
